short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ProcureDesk website plugin turns any approved website to a punchout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ProcureDesk website plugins allows users to extract purchasing cart data from approved websites and send the data to ProcureDesk for purchase authorization. This extension should be used in conjunction with your ProcureDesk account.
